page.title: 01Barford and Wasperton
page.content: The river Avon flows north to south from Warwick castle down to Stratford on Avon with two large westerley and one easterley loops passing between flood meadows, farmland and gardens of residential homes of mostly young executive commuter families. The majority of new homes have been built in last 25 years. With a primary school in Barford, all children over the age of 8 attend schools in Warwick or Leamington Spa. The majority attending private school. Besides the famring industru there are only two major employers Oldhams Transport and Hemmings Mill, others are in the service industries with part time staff.. Tenant farmers disappear as land owners take over the cultivation of the field making larger units and converting farm buildings to residetial homes. Most of the small
